Description: Fragment of limestone stele with Greek inscription. Smoothed top surface and striated rear preserved.
Curator's comments: Found in the area of the sanctuary precinct of Hera, but not necessarily in situ (Gardner 1888, p. 13, 61). Ernest Gardner diary (UCL Special Collections, MS ADD 82) 6, penultimate page. Registration started in 1888, as 1888,0601.36, but not completed. For this reason the three unregistered inscription (2012,5012.1-3), although previously catalogued and published (in The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum) have been registered in 2012.
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1089)
Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (pp. 13, 61, 68, pl. XXII, no. 14)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no.30, pl. 40,1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.02)
